A [[Typhoon Release]] technique used by Nowaki through his [[kekkei genkai]].

== Usage ==
After forming the necessary hand seals, he releases a storming vortex that can be used to simply limit his enemy's field of vision or do massive damage to his surroundings, mowing down anything around him. With effort he can increase the scale and intensity of the storm, being capable of covering an entire island.

[[pl:Taiton: Kyōfū Reppa]]
[[pt-br:Estilo Tufão: Rajada Consecutiva de Fortes Ventos]]
